links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,100
prog: (PARI) { a=n=0; forstep (p=2, 200, 2, write("b061788.txt", n++, " ", a+=p^p) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 28 2009]
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, May 25 2001
extensions: More terms from Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), May 26 2001
More terms from _Harvey P. Dale_, May 04 2013
